title: Understanding Pi Bonds
text: Pi bonds are formed by the sideways overlap of $$p$$ orbitals. Look for overlapping $$p$$ orbitals in the images.

title: Identifying Sigma Bonds
text: Sigma bonds are formed by the head-on overlap of orbitals. Look for end-to-end overlapping in the images.

title: Image I Analysis
text: Which type of bond is represented by the overlapping $$p$$ orbitals in Image I?
